channel.title: CVE Feed for SysAid -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SysAid -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36721|2024-08-04T01:01:59.031Z -- sysaid -- sysaid%20api
item.description: Sysaid API User Enumeration - Attacker sending requests to specific api path without any authorization before 21.3.60 version could get users names from the LDAP server.

item.title: CVE-2024-27775|2024-08-02T00:41:54.967Z -- sysaid -- sysaid
item.description: SysAid before version 23.2.14 b18 - CWE-918: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) may allow exposing the local OS user's NTLMv2 hash
